bioAsHtml: One of the first engineers to the Confluent team, Xavier is responsible for analytics infrastructure, including real-time analytics in KafkaStreams. He was previously a quantitative researcher at BlackRock, Barclays Global Investors, and MSCI. He holds graduate degrees from École Centrale Paris and Cornell University.
